trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality that represents the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: 定義可以表示網頁個人化資料的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this base class contain the actual implementation for managing, applying, and extracting personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自這個基底類別的類別包含實際的實作來管理、 套用，和擷取個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class makes use of personalization state with a reference to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>類別運用使用個人化狀態，以參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>。

trans-unit.source: If a developer writes a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> implementation, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> must also be written.
trans-unit.target: 如果開發人員可以撰寫自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>實作、 自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>也必須撰寫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances are responsible for creating and consuming <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> 執行個體負責建立和使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should always call the base class constructor from the derived constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別應該一律會呼叫基底類別建構函式從衍生的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> that manages Web Parts controls that have personalization data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />，管理具有個人化資料的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object created by this constructor manages the state for Web Parts controls that are managed by the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式所建立的物件會管理所管理的網頁組件控制項的狀態由指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="webPartManager" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartManager" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should always call the base class constructor from the derived constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別應該一律會呼叫基底類別建構函式從衍生的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，將個人化資料套用至與個人化狀態執行個體相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was a parameter in the constructor that created the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制已建立的建構函式中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用個人化資料的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，將個人化資料套用至指定的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to apply personalization data to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 這是抽象的定義，用來個人化資料套用至網頁組件控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization information from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，從與目前個人化狀態相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項擷取個人化資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of a method used to extract personalization information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 這是用來擷取從個人化資訊方法的抽象定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>與相關聯控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>物件。

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> was a parameter in the constructor that was used to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>已用來建立的建構函式中的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control from which personalization data is extracted.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項，個人化資料是從該控制項中所擷取。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization data from the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，從指定的 Web 組件控制項擷取個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to extract personalization data from a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 這是抽象的定義，用來從 Web 組件控制項擷取個人化資料的方法。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control from which the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter" /> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項 ID，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter" /> 是從該控制項中所擷取。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定 Web 組件控制項的授權篩選。

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter string for a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項的授權篩選字串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control before an instance of it is created.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制建立它的執行個體之前。

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if there is no personalized value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應傳回`null`沒有個人化的數值是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合不會實作任何預設行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property is provided so that a developer can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性，讓開發人員可以將任意字串值指派給自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項; 藉由訂閱檢查這個屬性可以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>以判斷控制項是否可以在頁面上的控制項加入至網頁。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any personalization information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已變更任何個人化資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any personalization state instance has changed (is "dirty"); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何個人化狀態執行個體已變更 ("dirty")，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class checks this property to determine whether the personalization state needs to be written back to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>類別會檢查這個屬性，以判斷是否需要寫回至基礎資料存放區的個人化狀態。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, gets a value that indicates whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，取得值，指出狀態執行個體是否擷取任何個人化狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any personalization state was extracted by a state instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果狀態執行個體擷取任何個人化狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is an abstract definition of a property that can be called to determine whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是抽象的定義，可以呼叫以判斷任何個人化狀態是否擷取狀態的執行個體的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Marks the current personalization state as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 將目前個人化狀態標記為已變更。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> can use this method to mark themselves as having changed (or being "dirty"), thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>可以使用這個方法將其本身標示為已變更 （或被 「 有所變更 」），以指出需要 reserialize 及儲存個人化狀態。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 要標記為已變更的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks a Web Parts control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，將 Web 組件控制項標記為已變更。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract definition of the method used to indicate that a Web Parts control has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 這是抽象的定義，用來指出已變更 Web 組件控制項的方法 （為 「 有所變更 」）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class exposes methods (which in turn call this method) that can be used by developers to mark a Web Parts control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別會公開方法 （這又會呼叫這個方法），可供開發人員將標示為 「 有所變更 」 Web 組件控制項以指出需要 reserialize 及儲存個人化狀態。

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時，將相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項標記為已變更。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance is now considered to have changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 這是用來表示的方法的抽象定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>與相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>執行個體會立即視為已變更 （為 「 有所變更 」）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class exposes a protected method (which in turn calls this method) that can be used by developers to mark the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>類別會公開受保護的方法 （也就會呼叫這個方法），可以由開發人員用來將標記相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項為 「 有所變更 」，以指出需要 reserialize 及儲存個人化狀態。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified Web Parts control is valid.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的 Web 組件控制項是否有效。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that `webPart` is a valid Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會確認`webPart`是有效的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The base class verifies that `webPart` is not `null` and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別會確認`webPart`不`null`並由其管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>與相關聯控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>物件。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> should validate Web Parts controls inside of any methods that work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>應該驗證可搭配任何方法內的 Web 組件控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that standalone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances do not have state changes accidentally written into the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保該獨立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>執行個體沒有不小心寫入頁面的個人化資料的狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is not currently managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 目前不是由與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" /> 管理。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 是 <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control currently associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項的參考，該控制項目前與個人化狀態執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is the object used as a parameter for the constructor that creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項是做為參數的建構函式所建立的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>物件。
